com.yaikhom.kdx
Class Manager

java.lang.Object
  com.yaikhom.kdx.Manager

public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates a KDX collection manager.

TODO: The current document meta-data retrieval process, which uses the filename instead of the document headers, is unreliable. In future updates, this will be modified so that the information is retrieved directly from the meta-data file header. Further information available at:

http://wiki.mobileread.com/wiki/E-book_formats

Author:
gyaikhom

Manager

public Manager(java.lang.String path,
               int maxlen)
        throws java.lang.SecurityException,
               java.io.IOException
Initialises a KDX collection manager for the supplied directory with collection name length specification. This also specifies the maximum length (number of characters) that is allowed for collection name.

Parameters:
path - the path to the documents.
maxlen - the maximum length of a collection name.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.SecurityException
Method Detail

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
This returns all of the collections, as required by the KDX collections.json file. This file should be copied (or replace) collections.json file in the system/ directory of KDX mount.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a JSON string.
See Also:
Collection, Checksum

process

public java.lang.String process()
                         throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                java.io.IOException
This processes the directory supplied by the user.

Returns:
a JSON string in KDX collections format.
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.io.IOException
